summary: So can we just talk about how Bruce was away from his home and was in the Hulk form for TWO YEARS! Yet when he came back to...
body:
Bruce Banner appreciation post

So can we just talk about how Bruce was away from his home and was in the Hulk form for TWO YEARS! Yet when he came back to Earth, the only thing he tried to do all the time was to help everyone. Even though Hulk refused to come out he, kept on fighting. He got into the Hulk buster for the first time and yet he went on to help the Avengers in the battle of Wakanda. He never ran away from the fight. He is a hero, with or without Hulk and we should appreciate that. He knew that this time he will get hurt. This time it wasn’t Hulk who was doing the fight it was Bruce Banner. He charged towards Thanos without any second thoughts even though he remembered what Thanos did to Hulk.

He indeed is the strongest Avenger.

summary: Great things about Captain Marvel that people arent talking about
body:
Great things about Captain Marvel that people arent talking about

  • When Carol and Maria hug they rock back and forth
  • When Carol starts destroying Kree ships she breaks one with her torso while screaming “whoo hoo”
  • Everything about Talos, the Skrulls
  • Monica

summary:
Saw Captain Marvel last night. 
The Marvel intro being turned into a Stan Lee tribute made me want to smile and cry at the same...
body:
Saw Captain Marvel last night.

The Marvel intro being turned into a Stan Lee tribute made me want to smile and cry at the same time. Tbh, even his cameo made me want to do that.

I would be gay for Carol Denvers as Captain Marvel.

Badass women make me feel empowered and give me confidence that I can do anything.

I freaking love women in STEM.

Also not taking anymore bullcrap from people *coughs* men *coughs*

Stan Lee forever!!

summary: New Reports of Empty Theaters at Captain Marvel Add to Movie's Controversy
title: New Reports of Empty Theaters at Captain Marvel Add to Movie's Controversy
body:
New Reports of Empty Theaters at Captain Marvel Add to Movie’s Controversy

New reports of empty theaters for Captain Marvel’s weekend showings are the latest in the movie’s ongoing controversy.

A number of Twitter users indicated there were empty seats at a number of Captain Marvel showings over the weekend.

The #CaptainMarvelreport from my local theater is SHOCKING. Out of 22 showings on Thurs, Fri, Sat, there were >570 EMPTY SEATS from advance ticket buyers WHO NEVER…

View On WordPress

summary: I watched Captain Marvel with my bro a few days ago (he felt really attached to the movie cause he just graduated from Air Force...
body:
I watched Captain Marvel with my bro a few days ago (he felt really attached to the movie cause he just graduated from Air Force training) and I don’t know what all the pre and post drama is about. 

They keep saying the lead actress is unlikable because of statements she made… but everything I’ve heard is the most milk toast social commentary ever? 

The whole situation just seems overblown and silly and proves to me (again) that whiny people come in all sizes and flavors.

If I had one critique of the movie, it’s that they should have gone even harder on 90′s maybe? Sometimes I forgot the movie was taking place in the 90′s. But then again, that’s not really the movie’s fault. Although I am a 90′s kid, the 90′s doesn’t feel like it has a strong… aura like the 80′s do. 

I think the CG on the cat was too obvious, but the CG to make Samuel Jackson younger was spot on. 

I think they might’ve exaggerated on the toughness for air force training too. Maybe it’s changed (though my dad and my brother went through it), but they definitely did not do that dangerous rope jump thing. Or at least, not like that. My brother said the swung over a pool and that’s about it. But like I said, maybe things have changed over the years.
